titles: A declartion [sic] and protest of the lords, knights and gentlemen in the Counties of Chester Salop Stafford, &c. against all assemblies which impose taxes upon the people without their consent by their representatives in a full, free and legall Parliament.
notes: Publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
